EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.NORAM only - Seroter - 7-10-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Register for SpringOne Platform by July 31 and score a ping-pong paddle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-ping-pong-2018]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Are you ready to go on a journey at SpringOne Platform? <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-ping-pong-2018]]> Join us September 24–27 in Washington, D.C., to hear the latest on how to build, deploy, and run cloud-native software; learn from cloud experts and enterprises; explore secret passageways; attend paradigm-shifting sessions; and solve an old wizard’s riddle.
And if you act quickly, you can score a sweet ping-pong paddle, too!
That’s right—register <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-ping-pong-2018]]> for SpringOne Platform 2018 by July 31 and you’ll get a brand-new ping-pong paddle when you check in! Be the envy of everyone in the office with this limited edition status symbol. YOU KNOW YOU WANT IT. Better rally while you still can.
Save the first game for me, Richard
